channel.title: Completion & Verification (Route 53, Google Console, Final Test) :: My Hugo Site
channel.description: This final phase connects the deployed backend to the public domain and verifies end-to-end functionality. DNS Configuration Step 1: Create Route 53 A Record Navigate to Route 53 â†’ Hosted zones Select sgutodolist.com hosted zone Click Create record Configure record: Record name: api Record type: A Alias: Enable Route traffic to: Alias to Application Load Balancer Region: Asia Pacific (Singapore) Load balancer: Select sgu-alb Click Create records DNS Propagation: Wait 2-5 minutes for DNS changes to propagate.
